info.title: KPI Management API
info.description: Customer, Product, Supplier and KPIEntry CRUD APIs

get.summary: Get list of customers with pagination
Get a single customer by ID

items.example: The email must be a valid email address.

get.summary: Get products assigned to a customer

delete.summary: Remove a product from a customer

get.summary: Get all KPI entries or filter by month

post.description: Bulk store multiple KPI entries at once.

put.description: Updates multiple KPI entries by ID with provided fields

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the soft-deleted KPI entry

description.example: This is a sample product description
This is a sample product description

get.summary: Get all suppliers assigned to a product

delete.summary: Remove a supplier from a product

parameters.name: supplierId
parameters.description: ID of the supplier to remove
